Name: Navigator
Text: The clouds cleared up during the night.

Name: Navigator
Text: Let's get the fuck out of here.

Name: Navigator
Text: One word about a palace in the crevasses and they will lock us up in a madhouse.

Name: Navigator
Text: Did I call it a palace before?

Name: Navigator
Text: Fuck it. Just try not to think about it.

Name: Navigator
Text: We'll be back at McMurdo before nightfall, and this will all be a bad dream.
